api dannawa samanyeyan aarthawa chakraya dina 28k washayen chakriyawa siduwannak , namuth eya poddak eha meha wana awastha nathiwa noweyi , api me dina 28ka aarthawa chakraya gana salakuwoth , ehi aarthawaya , nathnam rudhira wahanaya aarambha wu dina sita dina atak withara yanakam sidda wenne garbhashaye athulu biththi kadila iwath wela aluth patakawalin eya nawatha sakasa ganna eka ( me dawas tike lingikawa ekwuna kiyala gab ganime awadanama aduyi , 9,10,11 wage dawas wala garbhashaya aluth biththi hadagena innawa aluthin ena dimba sailaya pili gannata , namuth samanayen dimba sailaya nikuth wenne 12-15 athare dawasaka ...me nisa me dawas tika nam harima bhayanakayi .....na na ..bhayanakayi kiwe me dawas wala lingika ekwimak wunoth anarakshithawa , shukranu muda harimak wunoth gab ganimak wime awadanamak thibenawa ..
udasanama para ayine thawath wibhaga prathipala gana sanwadayaki.

aැmathiwaraya me bawa pawasuwe eeye (11) widya , thakshana , paryeshana , nipunatha sanwardhana ha wruththiya puhunu saha kanda udarata urumayan pilibanda amathyanshaye di pawathi madhya sakachchawakata sahabhagi wemini.ema awasthawata widya , thakshana , paryeshana , nipunatha sanwardhana ha wruththiya puhunu saha kanda udarata urumayan pilibanda niyojya aැmathi karunarathna paranawithana mahatha , amathyansha lekam sandhya wijaya bandara mahathmiya , karmika adhyapana ha puhunu kirime departhamenthuwe adhyakshawarun athulu ema amathyanshaya yatathe kriyathmaka wana aayathanayanhi sabhapathiwaru sahabhagi wuha.

man bohoma duppath .dawas ganaka wassa nisa ulu diyabath wela .athulatath thetha berenawa.podu waharin palpathakata samipayi.sindarella kathawatath podi samanakamak thiyenawa.eeth indikatta ho yodayata ee thathawaya therum ganima asiru wiya hakiyi.ehema baluwama wanithawage paththe bara tikak wadi wenawa.anika rupayath wadagath sadhakayak wenna puluwan ne.indikattage kumara jiwithaya gana mama undage ee wachana walinma ahala thiyenawa.ehema baluwama wanithawa kerehi irisiyawak upadawa gannawath mata ayithiyak nathi tharam.wathkam saha himiwim kawadath awamayi mata.
